name: Namcot Collection
overview: The retail version of Namcot Collection, unlike the free-to-play download release, includes the first season of Famicom games on the game cartridge. It also includes a bonus game, a Famicom arrange version of Pac-Man: Championship Edition. Its games are: Wagan Land Pac-Man Galaga The Tower of Druaga Battle City Star Luster Family Jockey Yōkai Dōchūki Dragon Spirit Quinty Splatterhouse: Wanpaku Graffiti
